name: Tandoori Harvest Sandwich
author: evenstareleni
summary: This sandwich happened when I had a bacon craving and not much else in the house.  I found a few things that didn't seem to match up, but I put them together anyway and the result was much better than I could have imagined.
ingredients: 3  large cracked wheat dinner-style rolls, split
directions: Cook the bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Remove the bacon to a paper towel-lined plate, keeping the drippings in the skillet; reduce heat to medium
Combine the apple, kale, tandoori seasoning, cayenne pepper, and apple cider with the drippings in the hot skillet
Drizzle the oil over the apple mixture; cook and stir until the kale begins to soften, 5 to 7 minutes
Remove from heat and set aside
Divide the kale mixture between the bottom halves of the dinner rolls
Top with the bacon and the Asiago cheese; finish the sandwiches by topping with the top halves of the rolls
